_sText: ZM_CITY_GRAVEYARD v 1.0 ------------------------------ The town of Timtamville has been overrun by brain-eating Zombies!! The streets are full of chaos, as citizen after citizen falls prey. Take the advice of Father Grigori who stands on the clifftop - get out while you still can!! And if you can't do that, "AIM FOR THE HEAD!!" zm_city_graveyard is the first Zombie Mod map by A.o.F. the SEAL / Predulus Version 1.0 of zm_city_graveyard supports up to 40 players. SPECIAL FEATURES --------------------- - Custom Nav file with place names (so your radio messages are useful!!) - NPC zombies (on fire) running about chasing some poor suckers - Father Grigori, the Mad Monk from HalfLife2!! - Some music from Michael Jackson's Thriller soundtrack - Spooky Thriller voice-over from by legerdary horror actor Vincent Price - 3D skybox - Several secrets - Lots of stuff to blow up - Lots of blood, fire and brain-eating fun!! *Some buildings borrowed from HL2 - thanks to Valve :D
